channel.title: Texas App Store Accountability Act
channel.description: Will Texas SB 2420 require parental consent for minors by Feb 2026?

item.title: Will Texas SB 2420 require parental consent for minors by Feb 2026?
item.description: Texas Senate Bill 2420, the App Store Accountability Act (ASAA), requires app store operators and developers to verify user ages and secure parental consent for minors. Effective January 1, 2026, targeting 7.5 million minors in Texas.

resolution.rules: Market resolves YES if Texas SB 2420 (ASAA) is actively enforced with app stores and developers required to implement age verification and parental consent mechanisms for minors by February 28, 2026. Resolution requires evidence of enforcement actions or compliance reports.
